attributes.action: Restrict fireworks to public events for pet safety
attributes.additional_details:
Throughout October to January, pet owners have to cope with petrified animals. Dealing with shaking, hiding underneath things, biting, toilet accidents, escaping animals and even paying a high vet prices for drugs.

We do a lot in this country to help SEN children and adults, but animals need help to, especially as they cannot advocate for themselves.
attributes.background: For pet safety, fireworks should be at public events ONLY. They should also either be a low decibel or silent as 90% of fireworks scare animals.

rejection.details:
The following petitions call for similar actions: 

Limit the sale of fireworks to those running local council approved events only
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732559

Reduce the maximum noise level for consumer fireworks from 120 to 90 decibels
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/738192
